item.title: Help me please :()
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

for your pickup command.

it has to have 5 digits in it.
example
::pickup 00995 1

that would give you one gold coin…

if your typing it with 4 digits, thats why your getting error.

your using All-Starscape V2 right?

item.title: Help me please :()
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

For number 15, you have to configure the doors.cfg, and make sure you added the object right. You may be using the wrong door model, or have to coordinates wrong.
Number 3, change the image of the client in the sprites folder. It’s usually title.png.
For number 7, I’m not sure how you meant it, but if you want areas that you can go to already, you just add some type of transportation there (ex. portal, npc teleport, teleport, or command), and then add objects. If you meant totally new areas, you are going to have to add new mapdata, and then add the extra land.
14, not that hard, just mess around with it, and you can make pretty good models in a matter of minutes.
8, add a command for ::teleport, that opens the 4 line text interface, and then add each case for the buttons, make the first 3 teleport, and the 4th one to open another interface for the lines, and add more teleports.

  1. It’s in client.java, I suggest downloading a source with the minigames already added, and copy the snippets.

If you need further help, feel free to PM me or add my Msn. [b]My Msn is Project-Rebirth@live.com

Read full topic

      if (command.startsWith("pickup"))
      {
         try
         {
            int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
            int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0)
            {
               addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            }
            else
            {
               sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
         }
         catch (Exception e)
         {
            sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
         }
      }
}

item.title: Help me please :()
item.dc:creator: @Snaz Snaz
item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

I’d suggest you portforward and get no-ip because nobody really plays Hamachi servers,

www.portfoward.com
www.no-ip.com
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: [/size][hr]For the ::pickup command, add this where your other commands are (Delete the current pickup command you have);

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

AND MAKE SURE YOU CHANGE YOUR PLAYERS RIGHTS TO ADMIN & ABOVE!

Go to Characters file, and click on your characters name, and it will say ‘Rights = 0’ Change this to 2, or above.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: [/size][hr]How to add working doors!

Look for a file named 'Doors.cfg’

When you find it , open it up and it will be like this;
/ XCoord YCoord Id FaceO FaceC Face State Height
door = 2726 3368 1533 -2 -3 -3 1 0
door = 2594 3102 1530 -2 -3 -3 1 0
door = 2603 3082 1533 -2 -1 -1 1 0

with the door = 2603 etc, Right click the door on your server and see what the object id is and put ‘door = (Door ID)’

Then for the next 2 set of digits, they are where the door is located, stand next to the door and do ‘::mypos’ and it well tell you the X & Y co-ords, copy them into the doors.cfg!

and then you can play around with the -2 -3 -3 bit, These are the way the door is facing to start, and the way you want it to open, This will help ;

0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH

then leave the last 2 digits unless you are adding a door on the second floor.

Hope this helps!

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please :()
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

i need help with 16 questions b4 im finished with my server. here are them. ps its a 317. Big Grin

  1. How to add jad, pc, assault and other kind off minigames?

  2. how to recolor items like gs and whips in class8.java?

  3. how do i change background on my client and change the options on it?

  4. how to use hamachi or no-ip? ps- i have heard something abouut utorrent?

  5. i cant use ::pickup idk why but i cant use it. and i am an owner. how to fix it like i can use it? (code under)

Code:

}
  if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 3))
  {
     try
     {
        int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
        int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

        if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0)
        {
           addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
        }
        else
        {
           sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
        }
     }
     catch (Exception e)
     {
        sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
     }
  }

}

  1. how to get like i can use ::pickup 995 10 and get 10 coins instead off ::pickup 00995 10 and so i can use both ::pickup 995 10 and like ::pickup 13636 1?

  2. how can i add new areas in the game like for events and that?

8.how to add that i can type ::teleports and then a list pop up like this--------

Code:

      varrok          falador          catherby         and other citys

and i can click on the name i wanna go and i tele there?

  1. how to add different staff crowns like mod is silver crown with m in the crown and admin is gold crown with a in it and owner is black crown with red o in it?

  2. how to add other teleports into the emote tab and mage book? one problem i dont got clickingmost.java

  3. how to add mystery events like when a man pop up from nowhere and say (name come with me) and then i have to do something like kill a thing wich isn’t like the other monsters and get a key and give it to him and i get 100k gold and get back where i was?

  4. how to decide hp off the npc’s like when i use ::npc 3864 its general graador it fills upp full hp when i kill it so i cant kill it?

  5. this isnt really a question becuz i think i can use hamachi (i have an acc on hamachi. so i just have to give the downloaded box to my friends and then they join my network and so we can play with eachother? answer if its right or not plz)

  6. how to use blender or metaquasa? can somone tell me what button is what and show me how to draw the item im gonna make?

  7. how to add doors that work? when i ADD A DOOR i cant open it.

please numberize the questions ur answering on thanks for reading
